king.name: king
king.desc: The King Shamadan is a powerful character who has managed to escape from all enemies through his exaggerated and excessive intelligence

mafia.name: mafia
mafia.desc: The Mafia Shamadan is a character who attempts to steal the Shamadan and discover its secret by following it and its accomplices, and by threatening the Shamadan to reveal the secret recipe

magician.name: magician
magician.desc: The Magician Shamadan is the character who creates the Shamadan and is the only one who knows the secret of its magical recipe

hero.name: hero
hero.desc: The Hero Shamadan is a character who attempts to steal the Shamadan and discover its secret through his strength and violence resulting from his boxing sport to uncover the secret recipe

joker.name: joker
joker.desc: The Joker Shamadan is a character who attempts to steal the Shamadan and discover its secret through tricks to reveal the secret recipe

diva.name: diva
diva.desc: The Diva Shamadan is a character who attempts to steal and discover the secret of the Shamadan through her charm and by commanding her followers to uncover the secret recipe
